name: React Alarm Clock
tagline: A web alarm clock which is implemented by React.js
body:
Prerequisite
------------
* nodejs >= v0.10.36
* jsx >= 0.12.2

Build
-------------------
1. Compile app.jsx to app.js
```
jsx --extension jsx app.jsx > app.js
```
2. Put this project to a place where a web server can access
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
